2005760.name: Shuriken Trigger
2005760.description:
Master the ninja art of wall-running while fighting room after room of syndicate thugs and deadly robots in this unique top-down action shooter.

Imperial Tower is the headquarters of a crime syndicate that has kidnapped two children of the ninja clan. To rescue them, a lone ninja must take on floor after floor of deadly enemies until he reaches the secret basement vault.

Features:

  • Ninja Movement: Learn how to survive while running across the four walls of a room. Jump from wall to wall or corner to corner to dodge attacks.

  • Grappling Hook: Grab weapons and items and interact with the environment with your grappling hook.

  • Falling with Style: Avoid obstacles as you descend through the ducts of Imperial Tower's ventilation system.

  • Unlock Equipment: Picking up new weapons and items unlocks them so you can bring them on the next attempt. Finding vent keys unlocks shortcuts through the tower.
